attributes.action: Release information about military interest in the balls of light and crop circle phenomenon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want the PM to reveal what the gov knows about the balls of light seen in & around cropcircles in wiltshire.
  "We know" there is military interest as army helicopters have been filmed observing & chasing these balls of light on several different occasions!
  Whats going on & why the denial when video tape proof is available?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
